For the average price of a normal store bought greeting card, Feeding Cards provides a heart connecting, planet saving greeting card that feeds and supports 10 malnourished children saving our planet and people in a sustainable way. Feeding Cards is a 501(c)3 non-profit with a mission to end childhood hunger. Have your next greeting card feed 10 kids! www.FeedingCards.org

Bounce Back Profits provides consulting, information, tools and techniques to get your customers to immediately re-purchase again and again and again. One of the ways Bounce Back Profits does this is by adding Social Entrepreneurship to your business. In partnership with the non-profit Feeding Cards, Bounce Back Profits creates a custom thank you card that not only thanks your customer but also has them bouncing back for more business!

summary: The MOST POWERFUL way to BUILD A BUSINESS is with the help of other educated successful business owners. I'm a business owner and I believe our country's greatest asset and the backbone of the economy is an EDUCATED BUSINESS OWNER. Through direct response marketing and mastermind groups, the Arizona Marketing Association helps local Arizona Business Owners Succeed - Try us out for $1 and I'll even include dinner:                                     www.TryAzMA.com LET'S CONNECT - Call me at directly at 480-563-3331 or by email at blaine@forcedclarity.com and mention that you are a LinkedIn connection of mine to receive my FORCED CLARITY REPORT - The 4 (Easy) Steps You Can Use To Gain Clarity (Including how to find the EXTRA time to do it!). Visit www.ForcedClarity.com right now to download it at no cost. I'm a lifetime solopreneur & entrepreneur. I've been creating and operating profitable businesses for 3 decades. I graduated from Purdue University in 1985. I've owned and operated a consulting firm, a pizza franchise, four health and wellness businesses, a personal development company and recently started several Social Enterprises to help end malnutrition. I know the power of business can solve social issues in sustainable ways. I enjoy helping people take control of their lives by taking control of themselves. I've been able to help people get more stuff done - especially the right stuff. My wife started a non-profit using greeting cards to help feed children so any support of Feeding Cards would be appreciated. I'm running local and nationwide business mastermind groups if you are interested contact me. I look forward to connecting with you.Specialties: Social EntrepreneurshipSolopreneurshipSelf DevelopmentMarketingHealth and WellnessConsultingMentoringMastermind GroupsImplementation - Getting the RIGHT stuff done!
